  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static void
    getAndUploadHash​(File worldFile)
    Packs the current world folder and the latest.log file into a ZIP file named "verification-[worldFileName].zip" in the verificationFolder using IOUtils.packZipFile(String, String, String) It then converts the ZIP-File into a Hash using IOUtils.zipToHash(File) and sends it to the Verification-Server using uploadHashToken(long, String) This method should be called asynchronously via uploadHash(boolean, boolean) if possible.
    (package private) static com.google.gson.JsonObject
    getGetRandomToken​(long runId)
    Sends a getRandomRequest with the runId to the Verification-Server via the ServerSideRNGConfig.GET_RANDOM_URL, and returns a JsonObject containing the random.
    (package private) static com.google.gson.JsonObject
    getStartRunToken()
    Sends a startRunRequest to the Verification-Server via the ServerSideRNGConfig.START_RUN_URL, and returns a JsonObject containing the runId of the session and the random.

    • needsUpload

      public static boolean needsUpload()

    • onInitializeClient

      public void onInitializeClient()
      Adds an event to the onComplete listener of SpeedRunIGT that fires at run completion. It will save the world and upload its Hash after a delay of one second.
      Specified by:
      onInitializeClient in interface net.fabricmc.api.ClientModInitializer
      See Also:
      )

    • log

      public static void log​(org.apache.logging.log4j.Level level, String message)

    • register

      public static void register​(com.mojang.brigadier.CommandDispatcher<net.minecraft.server.command.ServerCommandSource> dispatcher)
      Registers the command serversiderng_uploadRun that will save the world and upload it's hash via the getAndUploadHash(File) method.
      Parameters:
      dispatcher - the CommandDispatcher to add the command to
      See Also:
      )

    • getAndUploadHash

      public static void getAndUploadHash​(File worldFile)
      Packs the current world folder and the latest.log file into a ZIP file named "verification-[worldFileName].zip" in the verificationFolder using IOUtils.packZipFile(String, String, String) It then converts the ZIP-File into a Hash using IOUtils.zipToHash(File) and sends it to the Verification-Server using uploadHashToken(long, String) This method should be called asynchronously via uploadHash(boolean, boolean) if possible.
      Parameters:
      worldFile - the file of the world to zip and upload the hash of
      See Also:
      IOUtils.zipToHash(File), IOUtils.packZipFile(String, String, String), )

    • uploadHash

      public static void uploadHash​(boolean lastSave, boolean playerFeedback)

    • getStartRunToken

      static com.google.gson.JsonObject getStartRunToken() throws IOException
      Sends a startRunRequest to the Verification-Server via the ServerSideRNGConfig.START_RUN_URL, and returns a JsonObject containing the runId of the session and the random. Automatically grabs the UUID of the current GameProfile for the upload. This method should be called asynchronous due to the delay associated with the request.
      Returns:
      a JsonObject with the runId as the Long value for the "runId" property and the random as the Long value for the "random" property
      Throws:
      IOException
      See Also:
      IOUtils.makeRequest(JsonObject, String), ServerSideRNGConfig.START_RUN_URL

    • getGetRandomToken

      static com.google.gson.JsonObject getGetRandomToken​(long runId) throws IOException
      Sends a getRandomRequest with the runId to the Verification-Server via the ServerSideRNGConfig.GET_RANDOM_URL, and returns a JsonObject containing the random. Automatically grabs the UUID of the current GameProfile for the upload. This method should be called asynchronous due to the delay associated with the request.
      Parameters:
      runId - the Long runId for the RNGSession associated with the request.
      Returns:
      a JsonObject with the random as the Long value for the "random" property
      Throws:
      IOException
      See Also:
      IOUtils.makeRequest(JsonObject, String), ServerSideRNGConfig.GET_RANDOM_URL

    • uploadHashToken

      static void uploadHashToken​(long runId, String hash) throws IOException
      Uploads a Hash together with the runId to the Verification-Server via the ServerSideRNGConfig.UPLOAD_HASH_URL. Automatically grabs the UUID of the current GameProfile for the upload. This method should be called asynchronous due to the delay associated with the request.
      Parameters:
      runId - the Long runId for the RNGSession associated with the {code Hash}.
      hash - the Hash that should be uploaded to the Verification-Server
      Throws:
      IOException
      See Also:
      IOUtils.makeRequest(JsonObject, String), ServerSideRNGConfig.UPLOAD_HASH_URL
